attributes.action: Close loopholes that allow criminals to evade prosecution because they have told the CPS that they are on medication for mental problems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through this the victim is left stranded with no suport & posibly £100s if not £1000s of pounds out of pocket having to replace the stolen goods & repair the damage caused. Though I am refering to several spacific cases, no doubt this is replicated throughout the country. Again everything is on the side of the criminal, with the victim being left with no retribution through the courts, & the feer of being targeted again, because the scum forgets his pill, & knows how to work the system.
